typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string,
		Customer_I as string,
		Open_Dt as string,
		Consul_Dt as string,
		VAC_ID as string,
		DR_Name as string,
		State as string,
		Country as string,
		DOB as string,
		FLAG as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StageSource
StageSource derive(Open_Dt = toDate(substring(Open_Dt,1,4)+'-'+substring(Open_Dt,5,2)+'-'+substring(Open_Dt,7,2),'yyyy-MM-dd'),
		Consul_Dt = toDate(substring(Consul_Dt,1,4)+'-'+substring(Consul_Dt,5,2)+'-'+substring(Consul_Dt,7,2),'yyyy-MM-dd'),
		DOB = toDate(substring(DOB,1,1)+'-'+substring(DOB,2,2)+'-'+substring(DOB,4,4),'MM-dd-yyyy')) ~> DateTransform
DateTransform split(trim(Country)=='IND',
	trim(Country)=='USA',
	trim(Country)=='PHIL',
	trim(Country)=='NYC',
	trim(Country)=='AU',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(IND, USA, PHIL, NYC, AU, NonMatched)
ConditionalSplit1@IND sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Name,
		Cust_I = Customer_I,
		Open_Dt,
		Consul_Dt,
		VAC_ID,
		DR_Name,
		State,
		Country,
		DOB,
		Flag = FLAG
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> TableIndia
ConditionalSplit1@USA sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Name,
		Cust_I = Customer_I,
		Open_Dt,
		Consul_Dt,
		VAC_ID,
		DR_Name,
		State,
		Country,
		DOB,
		Flag = FLAG
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> TableUSA
ConditionalSplit1@PHIL sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Name,
		Cust_I = Customer_I,
		Open_Dt,
		Consul_Dt,
		VAC_ID,
		DR_Name,
		State,
		Country,
		DOB,
		Flag = FLAG
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> TablePhil
ConditionalSplit1@NYC sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Name,
		Cust_I = Customer_I,
		Open_Dt,
		Consul_Dt,
		VAC_ID,
		DR_Name,
		State,
		Country,
		DOB,
		Flag = FLAG
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> TableNYC
ConditionalSplit1@AU sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Name,
		Cust_I = Customer_I,
		Open_Dt,
		Consul_Dt,
		VAC_ID,
		DR_Name,
		State,
		Country,
		DOB,
		Flag = FLAG
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> TableAU
